subtitle: i received a call from
a good old friend
we became friends he began as one of my
students still a student but is now a
friend as well
and he said these following words
which i want to share with you i feel
i have been asleep for most of my life
and just now i'm rousing
awakening i understood what he meant but
i still wanted to hear it in his words i
said what do you mean
he says you know what i mean
no please tell me explain he said
i was involved in finance
he has several homes he's quite wealthy
successful
built a nice family you could say pretty
much of a success story
he says that was my reality
i'm comfortable it's not like the
kova 19 has destroyed my life
but i suddenly realized that that which
i invested in so much
where i spent most of my time and my
energy my quality time
is important but it's on the surface
level
and i feel now that i am awake i'm awake
to the fact that there's a whole other
dimension
i've always heard it from you he said
and it resonated with me but i going
right back to
my patterns i went back to my
approach to life and what would you do
with this new
epiphany i asked him you think it will
go away
when this whole pandemic ends he says
very possible but i hope not
awakenings exactly right
there are things that are called wake up
calls
they help us get to a point
where we realize that whatever has been
happening until now
it may be real important but there's
always new dimensions
using the analogy i've shared a number
of times climbing the mountain
as you see broader horizons that doesn't
mean the
perspective you had yesterday was
incorrect it just meant it was narrower
you're awakened to a newer and deeper
reality
embrace it it's what makes us who we are
embrace it celebrate it
ask yourself can i experience more such
awakenings
you
